original_text: The Lord says, ‘I will bring back Jacob's descendants to their own land. Enemies have knocked down their houses, but I will repair the homes where they lived. I will be kind to them, so that each family can live safely. The city will stand again in its right place. The palace will also stand where it was before. korean_text: 여호와께서 말씀하시니라 보라 내가 야곱 장막의 포로들을 돌아오게 할 것이고 그 거처들에 사랑을 베풀 것이라 성읍은 그 폐허가 된 언덕 위에 건축될 것이요 그 보루는 규정에 따라 사람이 살게 되리라

sentences.original_text: I will bring back Jacob's descendants to their own land.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 야곱의 자손을 그들의 본토로 돌아오게 하리라.

sentences.original_text: Enemies have knocked down their houses,
but I will repair the homes where they lived.
I will be kind to them,
so that each family can live safely.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 각 가족이 안전하게 살 수 있게 하리라.

sentences.original_text: The city will stand again in its right place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성읍이 그 바른 곳에 다시 서리라.

sentences.original_text: The palace will also stand where it was before.
